description: Has a bit of a learning curve but after that it is so simple to use and update your data and your graphs. Hands down the best graphing tool out there.
A perfect and simple to use plotting application.
summary: A perfect and simple to use plotting application

description: It's an easy to use yet quite robust plotting program. Really useful!

This is really an awesome graphing/charting tool!! Go through the tutorial to really appreciate its power. It will be useful for me in my Data Science and Analytics courses. 

It looks to be very useful for actual work as well so it is not just for college. It looks very solidly programmed with good UI interface. 

Thank you so much!!
summary: This will be a great companion to any Data Science/Analytics major

description: kubuntu 22.04 can be installed? appear in the menu, but does not start.

Tiene una organización muy coherente y práctica, diferente a la mayoría de los programas similares. Puede resultar extraña al principio, pero luego de unos minutos de acostumbramiento resulta muy superior.
summary: Su diseño es excelente, tiene una organización muy inteligente
